Auth.error-password-too-short: Password must be at least {minCharCount, plural, =1 {one character} other {# characters}} long

PwdReset.error-password-too-short: Password must be at least {minCharCount, plural, =1 {one character} other {# characters}} long
PwdReset.description-1: You appear to be logging in to the intranet for the first time. At this point, you must first assign a new password.
PwdReset.description-2: Please enter a new password and then click on the green button.
PwdReset.success-message: The password has been successfully changed. Please log in again for the changes to take effect.
